name: Cow & Chicken
overview: Not to be outdone the C64 has also had some new games to play this week, as we've also learnt from Saberman that Protovision have released a very early teaser of a game called ' Cow & Chicken '. Now unlike the other games we've mentioned, this alpha download is purely to demonstrate the new player control system and movement engine, although you can select each character and view the different screens in the game itself.
